movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
